last_episode_to_air.name: The Final Fib
last_episode_to_air.overview: A new challenger mixes next-level bluffing with old-fashioned smarts to take the three panelists on a wild ride they won't soon forget.

name: Bullsh*t The Gameshow
overview: Contestants strive to correctly answer difficult trivia questions. And when they can't, they simply move on to plan B: lying through their teeth.

episodes.name: I Love The Way You Lie
episodes.overview: The game's first player, a Ph.D. candidate at Stanford, tries to outsmart the challengers. But will a science question lead to his fall?

episodes.name: No Risk, No Reward
episodes.overview: More contestants chase after life-changing money, doing their best to tackle trivia on everything from Kevin Costner to Cinnabon.

episodes.name: It Pays to Play
episodes.overview: One competitor closes in on the million-dollar prize while another closes in on the realization that this game isn’t for them.

episodes.name: Is Any of This True?
episodes.overview: Notting Hill is famous for what type of festival? How did Buzz Aldrin get his name? What animal has the stinkiest farts? Do your best. Take a guess.

episodes.name: Weasel Words
episodes.overview: An attorney’s ability to stretch the truth is put to the test. Also, a dad presses his luck and hopes his poker face will help him win big money.

episodes.name: This Game Is Not Rocket Science
episodes.overview: This game isn't rocket science, but that doesn't make it easy. The topics range from the Ten Commandments to actors with dirty mouths.

episodes.name: Disarmingly Dishonest
episodes.overview: A convincing contestant inches toward the million-dollar prize, answering a bevy of baffling questions — often incorrectly

episodes.name: I Can't Read Her
episodes.overview: Is she really smart or just really good at dishing b.s.? A self-proclaimed trivia nerd proves hard to read for the panel of human lie detectors.

episodes.name: Can You Find the Fraud?
episodes.overview: A real-life fraud detector joins the game, hoping to uncover whether a contestant knows her stuff — or if she's full of it.

episodes.name: The Final Fib
episodes.overview: A new challenger mixes next-level bluffing with old-fashioned smarts to take the three panelists on a wild ride they won't soon forget.
